DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy tolerance generic travoprost brand name formulation . In open label , randomize , crossover study , primary outcome intraocular pressure secondary outcome tolerance drop , measure subjective questionnaire . Patients randomize receive either brand name generic travoprost first visit . At second visit 3 week later , intraocular pressure measure questionnaire complete tolerance medication . Patients receive formulation travoprost . At third final visit , another 3 week later , intraocular pressure measure questionnaire complete tolerance second medication .
DOC.brief_title: Generic Travoprost Versus Brand Name Travoprost Patients With Primary Open Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
